attributes.action: Have a referendum on whether or not to join the Euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government promised a referendum on the Euro. I believe that we should have it as soon as possible to put the arguments over whether we should have it or not to rest once and for all.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/democratic-EU/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
